params.about_text: IMDBlite (an acronym for Internet Movie Database) is an online database of information related to films, television programs, home videos, video games, and streaming content onlineâ€“ including cast,production crew and personal biographies, plot summaries,trivia, ratings,and fan and critical reviews.An additional fan feature, message boards, was abandoned in August 2021. Originally a fan - operated website,the database is now owned and operated by imdblite.pythonanywhere.com, Inc.,a subsidiary of Fynd.
